about_the_game: Dive into the first chapter of the epic adventure and explore the beginning of the story about StormEdge guild!
detailed_description: Dive into the first chapter of the epic adventure and explore the beginning of the story about StormEdge guild!
name: StormEdge Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-540 or AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 250 or Radeon HD 5770
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Dive into the first chapter of the epic adventure and explore the beginning of the story about StormEdge guild!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
